titles.title: Jesus Is The Sweetest Name I Know

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Jesus is the sweetest name I know, newline And He's just the same as His lovely name, newline And that's the reason why I love Him so; newline Oh, Jesus is the sweetest name I know.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There have been names that I have loved to hear, newline But never has there been a name so dear newline To this heart of mine as the name divine, newline The precious, precious name of Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There is no name in earth or heav'n above, newline That we should give such honor and such love, newline As the blessed name; let us all acclaim; newline That wondrous, glorious name of Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And some day I shall see Him face to face, newline To thank and praise Him for His wondrous grace, newline Which He gave to me when He made me free; newline The blessed Son of God called Jesus.
